sentences.en: A young Moroccan stopped by police refused to show his papers.
sentences.cn: 一位被警察拦下的摩洛哥青年拒绝出示他的证件。

sentences.en: Britain imposed fines on airlines which bring in passengers without proper papers.
sentences.cn: 英国会对运载证件不齐全的乘客进入国内的航空公司课以罚款。

sentences.en: Even the quality papers agreed that it was a triumph.
sentences.cn: 即使是内容严肃的报纸也认为这是一次胜利。

sentences.en: He could have looked over the papers in less than ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 他本可在10分钟内把文件翻看一遍的。

sentences.en: He could read all the national papers at his leisure.
sentences.cn: 他可以悠然阅读所有的全国性报纸。

sentences.en: He folded the papers and stuck them in his desk drawer.
sentences.cn: 他将文件叠起来，塞进自己的书桌抽屉里。

sentences.en: He picked each lock deftly, and rifled the papers within each drawer.
sentences.cn: 他熟练地撬开每一把锁，把每个抽屉里的文件都偷走了。

sentences.en: His office was a disaster area of papers and full ashtrays.
sentences.cn: 他的办公室一片狼藉，文件成堆，烟灰满缸。

sentences.en: His papers were proof against all but the most expert of scrutinies.
sentences.cn: 他的论文几乎可以经受住最专业的审查。

sentences.en: Many, if not most, scientific papers are presented orally at scientific meetings.
sentences.cn: 许多科学论文，即便不是大多数，都是以口头形式在科学会议上发表的。

sentences.en: On his desk is a mass of books and papers.
sentences.cn: 他的书桌上有大堆的书籍和文件。

sentences.en: The papers in maths and English are very testing.
sentences.cn: 数学试卷和英语试卷很难。

sentences.en: The popular papers all have photo features on their inside pages.
sentences.cn: 通俗报纸的内页都有照片专栏.

sentences.en: Thereafter she wrote articles for papers and magazines in Paris.
sentences.cn: 此后她给巴黎的报纸和杂志撰稿。

sentences.en: When Sutcliffe had gathered up his papers, he went out.
sentences.cn: 萨克利夫收齐了他的文件便出去了。

trans.tran_en: Your papers are official documents, such as your passport or identity card, that prove who you are or that give you official permission to do something

trans.tran_cn: 贴纸（ paper的第三人称单数 ），用纸覆盖，隐瞒，掩饰
